alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains; West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Watch issued March 09 at 4:33PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE COLORADO AVALANCHE INFORMATION CENTER. …AVALANCHE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THURSDAY UNTIL 5 PM SUNDAY… *WHAT… Dangerous avalanche conditions are expected with high winds and heavy snow. Expect the Avalanche Danger to rise to HIGH (Level 4 of 5) During the night on Friday and continue through Sunday evening. *WHERE… Park Range, Elk Mountains, West Elk Mountains, Ruby Range, Red Table Mountains, Holy Cross Wilderness, Sawatch Range, Independence Pass, and La Garita Mountains. *WHEN… Expect dangerous avalanche conditions to begin on Friday night and last through Sunday at 5:00 PM. *IMPACTS… Heavy snow and strong winds will create dangerous avalanche conditions. Large and dangerous avalanches will be easy to trigger once the new snow accumulates. Avalanches will run naturally. Fowler
